projects.title: Dcompras
projects.description: The objective of the E-Commerce project is to facilitate the purchase and sale of products online. Project developed for Tecnologo ADSI 2021.

projects.title: MediFlow
projects.description: The objective of the project is to manage shifts and assign them within an interactive calendar. Project developed for Senasoft edition 2021.

projects.title: LindBot
projects.description: Lindbot is a multipurpose bot developed with discord.js v12, which allows you to perform many daily tasks such as viewing the information of the server or users until interacting.
